content: --- title: Passenger Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-07-25T08:31:11.569Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:34:51.706Z --- # PAX Info Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :----------------------------------------------------------------------- | | pnr | `'string'` | PNR | | flightLegId | `'string'` | Flight leg identifier | | passengerReferenceId | `'string'` | Unique id for identifying a passenger | | surname | `'string'` | Surname | | forenames | `'string'` | All given names | | unaccompaniedMinor | `'char'` | Y or N | | passengerCard | `'string'` | Loyality card or similar | | passengerCardType | `'string'` | Category of passenger card | | udor | `'date'` | Date of origination in UTC | | carrier | `'string'` | Carrier code, TK, XQ etc. | | flightNumber | `'string'` | Flight number | | suffix | `'string'` | Suffix code | | departureAirport | `'string'` | Airport of departure | | arrivalAirport | `'string'` | Airport of arrival | | departureTime | `'datetime'` | Scheduled off block time in UTC | | arrivalTime | `'datetime'` | Scheduled in block time in UTC | | cabinClass | `'string'` | Cabin revenue class. F, First class C, Business class Y, Economy class etc. | | checkedIn | `'char'` | Y or N | | seatNumber | `'string'` | Seat Number | | infant | `'char'` | Y or N | | gender | `'char'` | M or F | | specialServices | `'List'` | Special services details | |   ssrCode | `'string'` | Special service code | |   ssrSubCode | `'string'` | Special service subcode | |   extraInfo | `'string'` | Special service extra information | | inBoundTransferPax | `'char'` | Transfer passenger inbound flight indicator. Y or N | | inBoundCarrier | `'string'` | Inbound flight carrier code, TK, XQ etc. | | inBoundFlightNumber | `'string'` | Inbound flight number | | inBoundDepartureAirport| `'string'` | Inbound flight departure airport | | inBoundArrivalAirport | `'string'` | Inbound flight arri
